title: Championship Zed skin
body: How do you get the championship zed skin? Can you just buy it?

replies.body: When he is released, you'll be able to purchase him for 975 RP.  As a heads up, he's legacy, so we'll be available for a limited amount of time. That said, he's legacy, which means he'll made periodic returns to the store!
but the skin was removed from patch notes? is he still coming out in patch 6.18?
He isn't being released in patch 6.18.
Noooooooooooo!!!!!! I have the rp ready and sitting in my account....... So 6.19 then?
An official release hasn't been announced just yet.
Just out of context, Illaoi skin? Pls? Or will i go unnoticed for a fifth time? ðŸ˜¢ðŸ˜¢ðŸ˜¢

She's not unnoticed! We do realize she only has one skin at the moment. We don't discuss if there's a skin or not in development, unfortunately, as internal timelines change, and occasionally, a skin idea just doesn't work out. Because of that, you'll only see teasers/content on PBE if we 100% plan on releasing it.

XD u took it the wrong way maam. I meant that ive tried posting same comment 5 times and no one replied. Also, id like to know how high is she up on the list? She better be high becoz a skin for no full year? For a new champion as well? Damn. She better be up there with heimi and aatrox. LOL.
D'oh! We don't have a straight up priority list that's numbered, but since she has a smaller skin catalog than other champions, she certainly isn't on the lower end. :)
RIP YORICK lmao
What about Championship Riven then? Is she also not being re-released this patch?
Correct, she isn't this patch.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=R5sdXrzQ,comment-id=00020001000100000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-12T23:35:25.950+0000)
>
> Correct, she isn't this patch.

hi katey
I was hoping to get the skin in time for my birthday but I guess that's not happenening, Thanks for the reply though :)
RIP. Happy Birthday, though! <3
Thanks!!! :)
Is this price sure and not gonna change ? And is there a set date of the release ?
It won't change, no. He'll be 975. No specific date has be announced in terms of release.
We look at impactful champions in competitive, as are Victorious skins, as VGN Shadow had mentioned below.

So when will you guys be revealing Victorious Gangplank? :^)

Jokes aside, when do you guys usually reveal the Victorious skin?
My memory is really letting me down here ._.
:P It's usually revealed a bit closer to the end of the season. Still a good chunk of time between now and then, so you'll have to let your mind wander for a bit longer. :)
I read the ranked rewards were to be revealed sometime in September according to one of the red posts.  So does that just mean the other rewards then like borders, icons, wards, ect?
Not totally sure on the reveal timing of everything, but everything is usually revealed around the same time!
We all know it's Victorious {{champion:6}}  XD

they said in a post I think, I don't remember exactly where but they said that championship skins are not predictions but random, Victorious skins on the other hand will be for a champion that has impacted gameplay often or in a big way throughout the season

-Logs on sees if championship zed is released .
-Sees it's not released.
-Oh well, Logs off to try another day.
Hasn't been released yet.

On the note of Championship skins, I had a question about the championship team skins. Since I am a fairly new player, seeing these skins for the first time really caught my eye. But I found out that these skins were legacy, so I asked a friend if he knew any way of getting these skins without hextech crafting. He told me that every year during worlds, the skins would be released for a short period of time for purchase. I wanted to confirm if this is the case. Thanks.
Yes the championship skins come back every year available for purchase during worlds

Thanks

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Do they release a new championship skin every year? 

I know riven is one of them.... what are the others?
And shyvanna too
Is the championship zed will release at tomorrow ?
yeah when it gets released i assume
